overview: The ladies working in this presentable office in Rome lead secret double-lives. By day their job is to present their well-dressed bodies to all the serious business-men. But by night, a fat wad of money will tempt them to indulge in hefty sex-sessions. Clad in fancy lingerie they're introduced to the pleasures of anal intercourse. Eyes widen and air is gasped for when their customers' rods sink deep into their bodily orifices.
title: Special Masseuse
